title: Implement error handling and edge cases
description: Handle edge cases: missing/corrupted JSONL, circular dependencies, very long titles/descriptions, missing fields in old issues, file permission errors, project without .beads/ directory. Show helpful error messages instead of crashes. Add error reporting mechanism.

title: Performance optimization and profiling
description: Profile plugin for memory leaks, slow UI operations, file watching overhead. Optimize: JSONL parsing for large projects (980+ issues), list view rendering for 1000+ items, search performance, cache invalidation. Test with both reference projects. Use IntelliJ profiler.

title: Implement caching and file watching
description: Create file watcher for .beads/issues.jsonl to detect changes. Implement in-memory cache with invalidation. Handle concurrent access and debounce rapid updates. Provide cache statistics and refresh controls in UI. Use IntelliJ VirtualFileSystem APIs.

title: Git revision comparison and time-travel
description: Add ability to compare Beads state across git commits. Show which issues were added/removed/modified between commits. Visualize how dependency graph changed over time. Allow browsing historical issue states. Based on Bv's time-travel feature for comparing different git revisions.

title: Enhanced dependency graph with cycle detection and critical path
description: Enhance dependency visualization to detect circular dependencies, identify critical paths (longest dependency chains), highlight bottlenecks (issues blocking many others). Add graph layout algorithms for better readability. Based on Bv's graph insights feature that users found valuable.

title: Set up GitHub Actions CI pipeline
description: Configure GitHub workflow to: build plugin on every commit, run test suite, check code style (ktlint), generate test coverage reports, run Gradle verifyPlugin task. Fail on test failures. Add badges to README. Create .github/workflows/ci.yml.

title: Implement Kanban board view
description: Add Kanban board visualization showing issues organized by status columns (open, in_progress, blocked, closed). Support drag-and-drop to change status. Show issue cards with title, ID, priority badge. Filter by priority/type. Inspired by Bv's Kanban view which users praised for clear task status visualization.

title: Multi-user conflict detection and auto-refresh
description: Detect when .beads/issues.jsonl is modified by another user/agent. Show notification and offer to refresh. Handle merge conflicts gracefully. Highlight issues that changed since last view. Address multi-user collaboration concerns and erratic sync feedback.

title: Write user documentation
description: Create plugin documentation: Installation guide, Quick Start (how to enable for project), Feature overview, Settings/configuration, Troubleshooting. Write as markdown in repository. Include screenshots of main features. Publish to GitHub wiki or docs/ folder.

title: Core Plugin Development
description: Core plugin functionality including data models, JSONL parsing, file watching, UI implementation (list view, detail view, search/filter), and advanced features (dependencies, navigation, statistics).

title: Create design system and component library
description: Create cohesive design system defining colors, typography, spacing, component patterns using Jetpack Compose. Establish light/dark theme tokens, icon library specs, UI component foundations. Follow IntelliJ Jewel conventions while adding Beads-specific elements. Deliverables: Design tokens file, component library documentation, sample implementations.

title: Plugin stability testing and bug fixes
description: Run plugin in test IDE (runIde task) with real projects. Test with both reference projects and user projects. File and fix bugs discovered during testing. Ensure keyboard shortcuts work, no UI freezes, proper cleanup on project close. Manual QA testing.

title: Implement unit tests for data layer
description: Write unit tests for: JSONL parsing (valid/invalid data, edge cases), Issue model serialization/deserialization, dependency graph creation, data validation. Target 80%+ coverage for data models. Use JUnit 5 and Kotlin Test. Location: src/test/kotlin/me/zkvl/beadsviewer/model/

title: Onboarding tutorial and first-run experience
description: Create interactive tutorial for first-time users showing: how to open Beads project, navigate issues, use filters, understand dependencies. Add 'Getting Started' panel with sample project walkthrough. Address feedback about steep learning curve and complicated initial setup.

title: Implement status and priority indicators
description: Display visual indicators in list view: colored badges for status (red=blocked, yellow=in_progress, green=closed), numeric priority badges (color-coded P0-P4), icons from icon set for issue types. Implement tooltips explaining each status/priority. Make indicators consistent across all views.

title: Implement issue detail view
description: Create detail panel showing full issue info: title, description, all fields (status, priority, type, assignee), timestamps, dependencies list, comments. Implement collapsible sections for readability. Include copy-to-clipboard for ID and description. Support markdown rendering in description. Location: src/main/kotlin/me/zkvl/beadsviewer/ui/IssueDetailView.kt

title: Implement multiple projects/rigs support
description: Support viewing issues from multiple .beads/ directories (multi-rig scenario). Add 'Active Rig' selector in UI. Allow cross-rig dependency visualization. Show rig name prefix in issue IDs. Handle conflicts gracefully. Store active rig per IntelliJ project.

title: Implement dependency visualization
description: Create dependency tree/graph view showing issue relationships. For selected issue, show what it blocks and what blocks it. Implement collapsible tree with indentation. Allow clicking dependencies to navigate. Add 'Find path' feature to find dependency chains between two issues. Support circular dependency detection.

title: Build Beads directory detector
description: Implement logic to detect .beads/ directories in open projects. Walk up directory tree from current file if needed. Cache detected directories and watch for changes. Handle projects with multiple .beads/ folders (multi-rig support). Integrate with IntelliJ project system.

title: Implement release automation
description: Create release workflow that: bumps version numbers, generates changelog from commits, builds plugin distribution ZIP, publishes to GitHub releases. Support semantic versioning. Allow manual trigger with version input. Create .github/workflows/release.yml.

title: Implement issue pinning UI
description: Add pin/unpin buttons in issue detail view. Store pinned issue IDs locally (IntelliJ project-level storage, not in .beads/). Display pinned issues in separate 'Pinned' section at top of list. Allow drag-reorder pinned issues. Pinned issues persist across sessions.

title: Design layout and navigation wireframes
description: Design wireframes for: main tool window with issues list, issue detail view, dependency graph visualization, search/filter pane, quick actions toolbar. Define navigation patterns between views, keyboard shortcuts, accessibility considerations. Create mockups in Figma or similar.

title: Design & UX Work
description: Visual design system, icons, layouts, and theme support for BeadsViewer plugin. Includes design tokens, component library, icon set, wireframes, and light/dark theme implementation.

title: Timeline and Gantt chart view
description: Add timeline visualization showing issues on calendar based on created_at, updated_at, due_at timestamps. Gantt chart for issues with estimates. Help with planning and scheduling. Addresses feedback that Beads lacks integrated planning/scheduling features.

title: Implement settings and configuration
description: Add plugin settings for: default Beads directory path, auto-refresh interval, show/hide specific issue types, default sort order, theme preference. Store in IntelliJ IDE settings. Apply settings immediately without restart. Add settings UI in IntelliJ Settings dialog.

title: Implement issue list view
description: Create scrollable list view showing issues with columns: ID, title, status, priority, issue_type. Implement sorting by each column, in-place status indicators (colors/icons), row selection. Show summary counts at bottom (open, in_progress, closed). Use Jewel Table or LazyColumn. Location: src/main/kotlin/me/zkvl/beadsviewer/ui/IssueListView.kt

title: Design and implement icon set
description: Design icons for: issue status (open, in_progress, closed, blocked, deferred, hooked), priority levels (P0-P4), issue types (bug, feature, task, epic, chore, merge-request), common actions (filter, search, pin, jump-to-code). Create SVG versions compatible with IntelliJ's icon system. Store in resources/icons/.

title: Configure Gradle build and dependencies
description: Set up complete Gradle build configuration for plugin JAR generation. Configure dependencies (Compose, Jewel, kotlinx.serialization). Set up test runners. Configure code signing for release builds. Support both IDE plugin format and standalone distribution. Update build.gradle.kts.

title: Implement unit tests for UI layer
description: Write UI tests for: list view rendering, filter logic, search functionality, detail view display, navigation between views. Use Compose testing framework. Test light/dark theme switching. Mock data models for isolated testing.

title: Implement integration tests
description: Test plugin loading in IDE, tool window creation, file watching and automatic refresh, project detection, settings persistence. Use provided IntelliJ test framework. Test with reference projects (references/beads/ and references/MeshCoreQt/).

title: Implement issue statistics panel
description: Add statistics view showing counts by status, priority, issue_type. Show trend chart (issues opened/closed over time if timestamps allow). Show recently modified issues. Show issues by assignee if available. Make statistics interactive (click to filter).

title: Implement comments display
description: Display issue comments in detail view as expandable/collapsible thread. Show comment author, timestamp, and text. Highlight code blocks if present using syntax highlighting. Handle long comment threads with scrolling. Support markdown rendering in comments.

title: View mode switcher (List/Kanban/Graph/Timeline)
description: Add view mode selector allowing quick switching between: List view (current), Kanban board, Dependency graph, Timeline/Gantt. Preserve filters/search across view changes. Save preferred view per project. Inspired by Bv's multiple visualization modes.

title: Performance benchmarking with large datasets
description: Test and optimize performance with 1000+, 5000+, 10000+ issues. Profile rendering, search, filter operations. Ensure instant response times even with large Beads projects. Address feedback about sluggish performance as projects grow. Target: <100ms for all operations even with 10k issues.

title: Infrastructure & Production
description: Build system, testing framework, CI/CD pipeline, documentation, and JetBrains Marketplace publishing infrastructure.

title: Write developer documentation
description: Document plugin architecture for future contributors: module organization, data flow, Compose component structure, extension points. Include architectural decisions and trade-offs. Document how to set up dev environment. Add CONTRIBUTING.md.

title: Implement theme support (light/dark)
description: Implement light and dark theme variants using Jetpack Compose theme APIs. Define color tokens for all UI elements with readable contrast ratios. Test with IntelliJ's built-in theme switching. Ensure all components respect theme changes.

title: Set up JetBrains Marketplace publishing
description: Register plugin on JetBrains Marketplace (https://plugins.jetbrains.com). Set up automatic publishing from CI/CD pipeline when release tag is created. Configure plugin description, icons, screenshots, changelog. Set up plugin verification. Store API token in GitHub secrets.

title: Implement code reference linking
description: Allow clicking issue references in code (comments like 'TODO: bd-xyz') to jump to issue in Beads explorer. Implement inspection/quick-fix to turn TODO: id into proper issue links. Show issue preview on hover. Support bd-xyz and full issue references. Register IntelliJ inspection.

title: Implement internationalization (i18n)
description: Set up message bundles for UI strings (following IntelliJ pattern in BeadsBundle.properties). Support English initially, structure for future translations. Extract all hard-coded strings from UI code. Follow JetBrains i18n guidelines.

title: Create Beads data models
description: Implement Kotlin data classes for Beads issues matching JSONL schema: Issue (id, title, description, status, priority, issue_type, dependencies, comments, timestamps), Dependency, Comment, Metadata. Add serialization/deserialization using kotlinx.serialization. Location: src/main/kotlin/me/zkvl/beadsviewer/model/

title: Create distribution and installation packages
description: Generate installable plugin JAR/ZIP for manual installation. Create standalone distribution for users without IDE. Document installation methods (marketplace vs manual). Support plugin updates through IDE built-in mechanism. Test installation on clean IDE.

title: Implement quick jump and navigation
description: Add keyboard shortcut (Ctrl/Cmd + Shift + B) to open Beads explorer. Implement 'Jump to Issue' dialog (similar to Go to File) for fast issue search by ID or title. Support prefix search. Show recent issues for quick access. Handle navigation between list and detail views with keyboard.

title: Implement search and filter functionality
description: Add search box that filters issues by title/description (case-insensitive, full-text). Add status filter (checkboxes for open, in_progress, blocked, closed, etc.). Add priority filter (0-4 ranges). Add issue type filter (multi-select). Combine filters with AND logic. Show result count. Debounce search input.

title: Export issues to Markdown and diagrams
description: Add export functionality: export filtered issues to Markdown format, generate Mermaid/Graphviz diagrams of dependency graphs, export issue lists with metadata to CSV. Support exporting single issue, filtered set, or entire project. Bv users praised quick export features.

title: Implement JSONL parser
description: Create efficient JSONL parser for .beads/issues.jsonl file. Handle one-line-per-JSON format, parse into Issue objects, handle parsing errors gracefully, cache results. Support incremental updates when file changes. Test with references/beads (980 issues) and references/MeshCoreQt (134 issues).
